message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,500 to start.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand your perspective. I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $13,500.
